languages.text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.
languages.original_text: Первое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} каждой атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} наносит дополнительный урон, равный текущей {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия.

traits.locale_text: The first hit of each burst attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current rate of fire.

languages.text: Первое {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} каждой дистанционной атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} наносит дополнительный урон, равный текущей {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельности{/g} оружия.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Первое попадание каждой атаки очередью наносит дополнительный урон, равный текущей скорострельности оружия.
Первое попадание каждой атаки очередью наносит дополнительный урон, равный текущей скорострельности оружия.

languages.text: 每次进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击时，首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}会造成额外伤害，伤害值等同于武器当前{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}。
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每次进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发射击{/g}时，首次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}会造成额外伤害，额外伤害值等同于武器当前{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}。

languages.text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de cada ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} a distancia inflige tanto daño adicional como la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} actual del arma.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de cada {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ataque de ráfaga{/g} inflige tanto daño adicional como la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} actual del arma.

languages.text: Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} jedes Fernkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}angriffs verursacht entsprechend der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe zusätzlichen Schaden.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} jedes {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündelangriffs{/g} fügt entsprechend der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} der Waffe zusätzlichen Schaden zu.

languages.text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} de chaque attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} à distance inflige un montant de dégâts supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme actuelle.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}attaque en rafale{/g} inflige un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal à la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de l'arme actuelle.

languages.text: 遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃の初回{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時、現在の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}に等しい追加ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} of each ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack deals additional damage equal to the weapon's current {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バーストアタック{/g}の初回{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}時、現在の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}連射速度{/g}に等しい追加ダメージを与える。
